Categories

Here are some guides that you can have a look at for Wiki-formatting codes:

  • http://www.tmbw.net/wiki/index.php/Basic_Wiki_Formatting
  • http://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/MediaWiki_User's_Guide:_Editing_overview

The MyBB Wiki has a few Contribution Standards that should be followed by everybody editing the Wiki. Please read these before editing the Wiki.
